name: Grapple The Vegs
description:
Vegetarians have taken over the world. Right after that they closed all fast food restaurants  and banned eating meat. As a passionate wrestler  and burger connoisseur, you decided to reunite an old crew  to face a common enemy together in order to reclaim the much-desired snack. Install instructions

(Windows)

  1. Download the Windows version 
  2. Right click the zip file and "extract all"
  3. Run the game by then double clicking Grapple_The_Vegs.exe
This game was made for a joke and I wanted to create something while learning Unreal Engine. I rather abandon further work on this game but maybe if people like it I'll think about a similar project only this time more serious😅.
